title: Max.Payne.3.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Max.Payne.3.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Release Date: June 1, 2012
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Rockstar Vancouver
Publisher: Rockstar Games
Publication Type: RePack
Game  Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: RELOADED

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows 7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit)
Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual Core 2.6 GHz
Memory: 2 GB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 512MB RAM or AMD Radeon HD 3400 512MB RAM
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0
Free space on hard disk: 30 GB

Description:

After the events of Max Payne 2 has been eight years. Max is not a cop - 
The three friends he was sitting on painkillers unemployed. Broken. Squashed. 
No target. But, by chance after moving to Brazil, he entered the service in a 
private security agency and is assigned to protect the family estate successful 
trader. Soon Max in their own skin to be felt not only New York, 
but Sao Paulo lives by its laws ...

Features:

Like in the movies. Uniquely fight scenes Max Payne 3 created by using advanced 
technology: the physical system Euphoria, corporate time dilation Bullet Time and 
"smart" cameras Bullet-Cams. No pre-calculated animation - Max moves, evades bullets 
and overcomes obstacles in full compliance with the surroundings and situation,
as opponents of "honestly" react to every shot.

Better safe than sorry. One of the features of Max Payne 3 is a system of shelters, 
introducing in shootout strategic element and allows players to battle in every new 
act according to the situation.If the friend was suddenly. Considerable role in 
Max Payne 3 assigned companions and opponents hero. To create characters on the 
court motion capture were recorded hundreds of hours of video, and it allowed 
each skirmish, each episode of the game to make a truly unique.

In the style of Rockstar. All in Max Payne 3 worked out to the smallest detail. 
Shooting does not go unnoticed: each bullet fired affects the appearance of the 
level at Max's face and body in the heat of battle stands perspiration, wound 
oozing blood enemies. Detailing incredible weapon: the trigger works, the shutter 
clicks, the sleeve popping out of the chamber.

Heroes do not go away. Role of Max Payne sang familiar to fans of the series, 
James McCaffrey, the original voiced detective Novels. However, Max Payne 3 his 
role was not limited to only one voice - James gave Max his appearance, 
but also made in acting roles on the court motion capture.
